amendment.description: To require a report on decisionmaking by the North Atlantic Treaty Organization.

vote.text: Amendment SA 817 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 817 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator McCain. (consideration: CR S6899; text: CR S6899) To require a report on decisionmaking by the North Atlantic Treaty Organization.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 817 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator McCain.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 817 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
